title: Contemporary Diamond Kangan: A Touch of Sparkle
features: Sleek, minimalist bangle design featuring a series of bezel-set diamonds in geometric diamond shapes. Crafted with a smooth, high-polish finish for comfortable wear. The linear arrangement of diamonds adds a modern twist to the traditional kangan. Features a secure hinged closure.
colors: Warm gold with brilliant white diamonds
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. Can be worn for a modern twist on traditional events.
description: These bangles offer a modern take on classic Indian jewelry. The use of high-quality diamonds adds a touch of luxury, while the minimalist design ensures versatility. Durable and comfortable for daily use. The perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style, reflecting the modern Indian woman.
